entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shaunavon
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3 except 6 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3 except 6 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 23 March 2023
